scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Wikis_BrowseWikis_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('inSidebar.vm')
$core_v2_ui.PagedContent('list.vm')
$core_v2_ui.Pager($wikis.PageIndex, $wikis.PageSize, $wikis.TotalCount, "%{ShowIndividualPages = 'false', ShowPrevious = 'true', ShowNext = 'true', PagedContentFile = 'list.vm', ShowFirst = 'true', ShowLast = 'true' }")
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Wikis_BrowseWikis_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="showTitleColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowTitle_Wiki" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showGroupColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowGroup_Wiki" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showPostsColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showLastPostColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest_Wiki" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="group" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Group" defaultValue="Group=-1" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_groupLookup" enableCurrent="true" /> <property id="groupAndSubGroups" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_GroupAndSubGroups" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="itemsBeforeScroll" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ItemsToShow" defaultValue="20" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="100" /> </property> <property id="defaultSortOrder" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_DefaultSortOrder" defaultValue="ApplicationName" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="ApplicationName" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ApplicationName" /> <propertyValue value="ApplicationIdsOrder" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Custom" /> </property> <property id="wikiSelection" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_WikiInclusion" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_wikiOrder" key="wiki" includeSubGroupsPropertyId="groupAndSubGroups" visibilityPropertyId="defaultSortOrder" visibilityPropertyValue="ApplicationIdsOrder" groupPropertyId="group" /> <property id="includeGroupName" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_IncludeGroupName" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="LastUpdated">Latest: {0}</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="post_plural">pages</resource> <resource name="post_singular">page</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ApplicationName">By name</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Custom">Custom order</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_DefaultSortOrder">Sort Order</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Group">Filter to Group</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_GroupAndSubGroups">Show data from Group and all Subgroups</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_IncludeGroupName">Include current group's name in Title (Title must be a formatted string with a {0} placeholder)</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ItemsToShow">Number of results to display</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_NoResults">No results could be found.</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowGroup_Wiki">Show Wiki Group Name</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest_Wiki">Show Last Update</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts">Show Post Count</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowTitle_Wiki">Show Wiki Name</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_WikiInclusion">Include Wikis</resource> <resource name="Wikis_BrowseWikis_Description">Displays a browse control to view all wikis on the site.</resource> <resource name="Wikis_BrowseWikis_Name">Wikis - Browse Wikis</resource> <resource name="Wikis_BrowseWikis_Title_BrowseWikis_In">Browse Wikis in {0}</resource> </language>
